data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will strengthen today and tomorrow, it will be windy over the coast of southern China. The weather will be cold in the morning and at night over the inland areas. A band of clouds will cover the region early this week. With the monsoon moderating slightly, temperatures will rise over southern China midweek this week. A fresh easterly airstream is expected to affect the coast of Guangdong in the latter part of this week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260208","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground, becoming east later.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Rather cool in the morning.
